name: Attack on Titan 2: Additional Costumes 16 Piece Set
name_original: Attack on Titan 2: Additional Costumes 16 Piece Set
description:
Give Eren, Mikasa, Armin, and Levi four new outfits each for a total of 16 outfits.
*This set includes Mikasa Costume 'Summer Festival'.

This content is same as 'Costume All Set' that was released for the previous game 'Attack on Titan', released in August 2016.
You can continue to use the costumes if they were purchased for the previous title, regardless of PS4™/ PS3™/ 'PS Vita', but you must download the contents again.


▼How to use
You can access the new costume by either of the following:
1. Select 'Another Mode' on the main menu, and then select the character.
Change into the new costume by pressing the X button when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select 'Story Mode' on the main menu, and then approach the character in the Daily Life section.
Change into the new costume by pressing the O button when you are near the character.

1 player
